item.title: Static Analysis Research - Windows PE
item.description: Overview Recently, I decided do delve a little bit more into static analysis, something beyond just running strings on a binary and getting the ASCII characters that are printable. I decided to take a deep look at how FLOSS is working and possibly recreate some of its functionality in my own tool. Before reading further, I want you to know that this post is about research I did on static analysis.
